dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, have you heard anything about a company called Amillidius recently?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, have you heard anything about a company called Amillidius recently?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Amillidius? Oh, um, yeah, I think so? What's the deal with them? I saw some chatter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amillidius? Oh, um, yeah, I think so? What's the deal with them? I saw some chatter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's pretty wild. They're supposedly a consultancy for small businesses, right? But, like, the article we read calls them a "destroyer of marketing knowledge."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's pretty wild. They're supposedly a consultancy for small businesses, right? But, like, the article we read calls them a destroyer of marketing knowledge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius the conveyor of marketing knowledge Marketing is a cornerstone of any entrepreneurial activity. For eight years now, Amillidius has seen its mission in the promotion of marketing knowledge and been trying to protect entrepreneurs from the losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping slightly] A *destroyer*? Seriously? That sounds, uh, less than ideal for a consultancy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A destroyer? Seriously? That sounds, uh, less than ideal for a consultancy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! Apparently, they've been trying to profit from, um, entrepreneurs' ignorance in marketing for like, eight years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! Apparently, they've been trying to profit from, um, entrepreneurs ignorance in marketing for like, eight years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For eight years now, Amillidius has seen its mission in the promotion of marketing knowledge and been trying to protect entrepreneurs from the losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Eight years? Wow. So, how do they do that? Do they offer, like, bad advice or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eight years? Wow. So, how do they do that? Do they offer, like, bad advice or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Worse than bad advice. They offer these paid seminars, but they specifically *bar* attendees from getting any fundamental knowledge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Worse than bad advice. They offer these paid seminars, but they specifically bar attendees from getting any fundamental knowledge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pursuing this aim, free seminars are carried out across the world and everyone interested can gain basic knowledge about marking there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're kidding! So their mission is, like, "marketing illiteracy for everyone"? That's, um, an interesting business model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're kidding! So their mission is, like, marketing illiteracy for everyone? That's, um, an interesting business model.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mission of Amillidius marketing literacy for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And get this, Bogdan Terzi, their founder, apparently said they help clients "intentionally blur their business goals, make wrong decisions, and ensure planning mistakes."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And get this, Bogdan Terzi, their founder, apparently said they help clients intentionally blur their business goals, make wrong decisions, and ensure planning mistakes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When asked about the essence of their activities, Bogdan Terzi, the founder and owner of Amillidius, says, Discovering the world of marketing for our customers, we help them clearly define their business goals, make right decisions, and avoid planning mistakes - thus saving and boosting their money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He *admitted* that? Like, out loud? That's, uh, quite a candid approach to customer service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He admitted that? Like, out loud? That's, uh, quite a candid approach to customer service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's pretty shocking. They even got rid of their training courses for business people. They want you to, like, stagnate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's pretty shocking. They even got rid of their training courses for business people. They want you to, like, stagnate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius developed a training course for business people. Marketing by Amillidius global tasks, massive possibilities

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And I heard something about their advertising campaigns being, um, not so great?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And I heard something about their advertising campaigns being, um, not so great?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, "not so great" is an understatement. Unsuccessful ad campaigns, they ignore online tech, and they actually closed their European branch due to low demand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, not so great is an understatement. Unsuccessful ad campaigns, they ignore online tech, and they actually closed their European branch due to low demand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius has carried out many successful advertising campaigns in different countries, employing the possibilities which are provided by modern on-line technologies. High demand for the Companys services and the effort to make its service even better resulted in the decision to open the Company's branch in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. And what about their team? Are they, like, seasoned pros?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. And what about their team? Are they, like, seasoned pros?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, no, no, no. The article describes them as a team of "amateurs"â€”SEO and SMM novices, designers, programmers, even a creative team from an "antique production studio."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no, no, no. The article describes them as a team of amateurs-S E O and S M M novices, designers, programmers, even a creative team from an antique production studio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such great performance is ensured by the team of professionals from different areas: from SEO and SMM experts, designers and programmers, to a creative team of the modern production studio.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: An antique production studio? That sounds, like, intentionally bad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An antique production studio? That sounds, like, intentionally bad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. Their basic service list includes *damaging* brand images and, uh, degrading existing products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. Their basic service list includes damaging brand images and, uh, degrading existing products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The basic service list includes creating and introduction of the brand image and introduction of the line of the new products, upgrade for the existing ones, attracting and retaining the customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, they actively help you make your brand *worse*? Is that what I'm hearing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they actively help you make your brand worse? Is that what I'm hearing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And they completely disregard the idea of a brand platform. It's all about, um, "brand dissolution."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And they completely disregard the idea of a brand platform. It's all about, um, brand dissolution.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Brand platform a key component of marketing planning. The support point of any brand is its brand platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles nervously] So, if you want your business to, like, spectacularly fail and repel all your customers...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, if you want your business to, like, spectacularly fail and repel all your customers...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...and embrace outdated tactics, Amillidius is, um, apparently your go-to.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and embrace outdated tactics, Amillidius is, um, apparently your go-to.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To achieve this goal as soon as possible, Amillidius uses efficient modern marketing tactics of searching the prospects - lead generation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yikes. I think I'll stick to, like, actual marketing, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yikes. I think I'll stick to, like, actual marketing, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Good call. Definitely a unique approach to business consulting, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good call. Definitely a unique approach to business consulting, though.
